EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Call Summery (1339019412.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Call Summery (1339019412.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear James, It was a pleasure speaking with you. I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call that highlights the: - Benefit we provide to consultants. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> And here is a list of items that highlight the benefits to your company: - Complete overview <http://mboenterprise.com/> and service we provide to companies who refer us consultants to be engaged.
- We eliminate reclassification risk and mitigate co-employment <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help/mitigate-risk> and business liability risk for your company.
- We drive adoption for you, by making it easier to recruit and retain talent <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help/drive-adoption>.
- We can hold security clearances <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf>. I will follow up with you as promised, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
